duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide therapy services to clients using a variety of modalities and approaches.
Manage and oversee case management for a caseload of clients, ensuring their needs are met and progress is monitored.
Handle insurance billing, claims submission, and benefit verification for clients.
Conduct clinical evaluations and assessments to determine appropriate treatment plans for clients.
Deliver telehealth services to clients, as needed, to provide access to care.
Supervision and mentoring of interns and junior clinicians, providing support and guidance in their professional development.
Participate in marketing activities to enhance the practice's visibility and attract new clients.

education_certification.credential: Master’s degree in a mental health related field (required)
Active Utah state license (LICSW, LCSW, CSW, LMHC, LMHCA, LMFT, LMFTA)
